title: It’s Time For The Bert Show’s FAVORITE Time Of The Year: Secret Santa!
description:
It's a source of tension for The Bert Show EVERY. SINGLE. YEAR. Does it have to be that way again this year? Probably! It's time once again for The Bert Show's Secret Santa!
